lead_paragraph: The decision is likely to end the fight by relatives of the shooting victim, a Brazilian misidentified as a suicide bomber, to have British officers charged.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: European Court Backs Police in Handling of 2005 Subway Shooting
headline.main: European Court Backs Britain in 2005 Subway Killing by Police

snippet: The decision is likely to end the fight by relatives of the shooting victim, a Brazilian misidentified as a suicide bomber, to have British officers charged.
abstract: European Court of Human Rights rules British prosecutors who carried out investigation of officers involved in shooting death of Brazilian Jean Charles de Menezes in London subway station 2005, believing him to be terrorist suspect, acted within bounds of appropriate authority.
